invalid_username.message: Must be a minimum of 3 characters, a maximum of 20 characters, and can contain only letters, numbers, and spaces, along with other common sense limitations.

inappropriate_username.message: Come on, the name you entered is inappropriate. Please choose a nicer word.

insufficient_airdrop_amount.message: Available token amount is insufficient. Please mint more tokens or reduce the amount to complete the process.

invalid_airdrop_list_type.message: Invalid List type to airdrop users.

no_users_for_airdrop_list_type.message: No users found to airdrop for this list type.
